Once upon a time, a donkey lived on a small farm.
He carried lots of loads every day.
But he was old and weak.
One day, he fell in the river on his way to the market.
The farmer was very angry and he chased his donkey away.
The donkey walked for quite a while.
Right! All the best musicians live in Bremen.
Suddenly, there was a howl from the ground.
I'm going to Bremen to be a musician.
Yes, I'll start a musical band.
The donkey and the dog set off for Bremen.
